FuncDef: This command configures an L2TP tunnel. A tunnel exists between a LAC-LNS pair and consists of a Control Connection and zero or more L2TP sessions. The tunnel carries encapsulated PPP datagrams and control messages between the LAC and the L2TP Network Server (LNS).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a valid string to identify a L2TP up to 32 characters in length.
Mandatory while creating a new tunnel.
